column5: Launched out of the Promenade to avoid the boat traffic from the GOSD fish-off.  Checked out the mature King action, watched the blast off and then headed out to the blue zone.  Kinda slow in the BZ this morning going 4/5 while dodging a treble from a spitting bow.  Here are a couple of pics of lethargic matures from in tight....      Here is a nice bow from the BZ.    Thanks for a good morning Rob!
Great report and pics Tundra N Lightning  Some real nice ones!! Thanks for sharing Leechman
Sweet fish! I gotta get out there!
Beautiful bow! Thanks for the photo's.  -R-
Good stuff!  You would have done well in the fish -off with those matures  The BZ should be solid for a while still too, can't wait to get out there myself.
